bug.author: RunnerZhong
bug.summary: Weights read error for InnerProduct(fc) op in Caffe models
bug.description:
Netron app and version: OS and browser version:
Steps to Reproduce:
Open vgg caffemodel via latest Netron.exe (4.5.5) Check weights of blob fc6.
vgg_16 model: <denchmark-link:http://www.robots.ox.ac.uk/~vgg/software/very_deep/caffe/VGG_ILSVRC_16_layers.caffemodel>http://www.robots.ox.ac.uk/~vgg/software/very_deep/caffe/VGG_ILSVRC_16_layers.caffemodel</denchmark-link>
Please attach or link model files to reproduce the issue if necessary. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30307463/96073468-151f5880-0ed9-11eb-9e00-210ac47199fb.png></denchmark-link>
below is the weights read from caffemodel via pycaffe api. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30307463/96073636-67f91000-0ed9-11eb-88d5-2d7f41ee4611.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Please check the weight's shape difference..
